about_the_game:
The Art Book (LSArtBook.pdf)downloads to Night Two's base game folder at \Steam\steamapps\common\Love Sucks Night Two[/h2][/b]

It can also be found by right clicking the game in your library > manage > browse local files > LSArtBook.pdf



Behold! This is the art book for Love Sucks!

Once Night Two's art was all done, the idea was floating around for something else we could make for people. Given that AIla's wonderful art is probably why most of you are here, Aila set about creating an art book as optional DLC for Night Two, a fun little extra thing for people who want to support us a bit more with a one-off thing, or who just want to see more art!

The Love Sucks art book contains 98 pages of Aila's beautiful artwork, sketches, designs, mid-meeting doodles, and ideas. It also has a bunch of commentary added in from the developers, regarding our thoughts on the process, and why we did the things we did.

content_descriptors.notes: This is full of naked people! Boobs, butts, sex and weiners.
